page.title: 18OUR PUPILS FROM HARPUR HILL
page.content: { We decided to do a survey of the pupils who live in the study area in the Lower School of Buxton Girls' School.{9%}lived there; just under half (19) replied to our questionaire. 11 had lived in their house for more than 5 years and 15 went to Harpur Hill Junior School. 8 lived on the Barrett housing estate and 3 in council houses. Most houses had 3 bedrooms and only 1 had 4 bedrooms. 16 girls had between 4 & 6 people living in their home; 6 was the largest number and 2 the lowest. All but 3 girls had pets; some had several. Cats(10) & dogs(10) were most popular. There were 3 hampsters, 5 goldfish, a rabbit, tortoise & a budgie. There were 9 Anglicans, 1 Methodist & 9 did not go to church. { }
